CliSrvBoth.Description: This function returns application behavoiour (client,Server or Both).
CliSrvBoth.Name: CliSrvBoth

CliSrvPort.Description: This function returns application behaviour port.
CliSrvPort.Name: CliSrvPort

CurrentLicStatus.Description: This function returns Number denoting current license status.
CurrentLicStatus.Name: CurrentLicStatus

IsGlobalTallyAuditOn.Description: This function returns True if the Tally audit on feature is set in any of the loaded companies.
IsGlobalTallyAuditOn.Name: IsGlobalTallyAuditOn

IsPromoCode.Description: This function is used to check whether the entered information at the time of activation is promocode or serail number.
IsPromoCode.Name: IsPromoCode

IsTallyAuditOn.Description: This function returns True if the Tally audit on feature is set in the selected company.
IsTallyAuditOn.Name: IsTallyAuditOn

IsTallyClient.Description: This function returns TRUE if it is configured as a Tally Client either direct IP to IP or through Link tally server else returns FALSE.
IsTallyClient.Name: IsTallyClient

IsTallyServer.Description: This function returns TRUE if it is configured as a Tally Server either direct IP to IP or through Link tally server else returns FALSE.
IsTallyServer.Name: IsTallyServer

IsValidAddOnHelpFileExists.Description: This function checks whether user specified AddOn help file is valid and exists. It returns 0 in case of Success, 1 in case Old version of Help file exists and 2 in case of File not exists.
IsValidAddOnHelpFileExists.Name: IsValidAddOnHelpFileExists

IsValidEMail.Description: This function is used to check whether the entered EMail is valid or not.
IsValidEMail.Name: IsValidEMail

IsValidGateway.Description: The function is used to know whether given port number and gateway name(or IP)  is valid gateway or not
IsValidGateway.Name: IsValidGateway
